content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate.Define change in regime.Describe the difference between change in regime and change in government.Explain why changes in regimes occur.Explain the effect changes in regimes may have on legitimacy.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
